Class Slave

java.lang.Object
Slave
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Slave
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Slave class, it computes the root of a given set of coefficients.
Author:
aezouhri

    • computeRoot

      public java.lang.String[] computeRoot​(double A, double B, double C)
      This method computes the root for the given generated coefficients from the coefficient buffer. And puts the roots in their buffer.
      Parameters:
      A - x^2 coefficient
      B - x coefficient
      C - constant
      Returns:
      A String[]
